abstract: Excessive heat could cause a failure of an activation switch for the brake light, the manufacturer said, as well as the loss of brake fluid.
snippet: Excessive heat could cause a failure of an activation switch for the brake light, the manufacturer said, as well as the loss of brake fluid.
lead_paragraph: Harley-Davidson is recalling about a quarter million motorcycles because their rear brake lights may stop working and brake fluid may leak, the manufacturer told the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.
